summary:
## The Majestic Alps

The Alps are Europe's tallest and biggest mountain range, stretching across eight countries. They formed millions of years ago when two tectonic plates crashed together. The Alps are home to super high peaks like Mont Blanc, which is the tallest at 4,809 meters.

People have lived in the Alps since ancient times. These mountains have seen lots of history, from Roman settlements to Napoleon's army crossing them. Today, the Alps are famous for skiing, hiking, and stunning scenery. They're also a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
title: Alps
